SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi.client

Class GameClientImpl

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientAbstract
it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi.client.GameClientImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameClient, Remote
public class GameClientImpl extends ClientAbstract implements GameClient
This class represents the implementation of a game client in the RMI network. It extends the abstract class ClientAbstract and implements the GameClient interface. It manages the connection to the server, sending and receiving messages, and user interactions.
